question: I have cities, but no houses. I have mountains, but no trees. I have water, but no fish. What am I?
The more you take, the more you leave behind. What am I?
I am a place of sand and sun, Where waves crash and seagulls run. Shells and treasures you may find, Beneath the warmth of the sunshine. What am I?
In the realm of trees, secrets hide, Whispers hush where creatures stride. What am I?
Seeking glory, unknown terrain, Challenges faced, treasures to gain. What am I?
Congratulations, you have completed the every quest. Come back later for more!
